title: Hospital Horse, Treat Unhoused People Like People 7.28.21
itunes:title: Hospital Horse, Treat Unhoused People Like People 7.28.21
description:
In episode 960, Jack and guest host Danl Goodman are joined by Cold Brew Got Me Like host Chris Crofton to discuss record Tokyo COVID numbers after start of Olympics, LA experiments with treating unhoused people like actual people, Kanye living in a stadium, hospital horse and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Tokyo reports record virus cases days after Olympics begin
  2. CDC reverses indoor mask policy, saying fully vaccinated people and kids should wear them indoors
  3. LA Experiments With Treating Unhoused People Like People Instead of Like Garbage to Be Removed
  4. Kanye Is Living in That Stadium Where He Debuted His Album
  5. Hospital Horse
  6. LISTEN: UBER - Nightcrawl
  7. LISTEN: Chris Crofton

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
